com.ga.commentsapi.exception

Class MyExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
      • com.ga.commentsapi.exception.MyExceptionHandler

  • @ControllerAdvice
public class MyExceptionHandler
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
    The MyExceptionHandler class extends ResponseEntityExceptionHandler class and handles the different exceptions. It is here where the message details and status are built for the http response
